title: Joy to the World

author.name: Isaac Watts
author.bio: Isaac Watts was an English Christian minister, hymn writer, and theologian. He is credited with over 750 hymns, including 'Joy to the World,' which remains a popular Christmas carol celebrating the birth and reign of Jesus Christ.

lyrics:
Joy to the world
The Lord is come,
Let Earth receive her King,
Let every heart,
Prepare Him room,
And Heaven and nature sing.

Joy to the world
The Saviour reigns
Let men their songs employ
While fields and floods,
Hills and plains
Repeat the sounding joy.

He rules the world
With truth and grace,
And makes the nations prove,
The glories of
His righteousness,
And wonders of His
